avalancheActivity.highlights: Little snowfall in the last days. Thinn wind slabs possible in gullies and lows in W-facing aspects. Older snow is stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some new snow in the mountains. Older snow underwent a lasting thaw and rain period and is stable. Thinn wind slabs may have formed in gullies and lows in W-facing aspects. Mountaineers are advised to be careful where slabs may have accumulated in terrain traps.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlægar áttir og vægt frost næstu daga, en rigning eða slydda á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Unstable wind slabs expected in S-W facing aspects after NE wind and snow. Older snow is uniform and stable after thaw followed by freezing.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Unstable wind slabs expected in S-W facing aspects after NE wind and snow. During mild weather and rain January 10th-15th, the snow melted, settled, and layers broke down.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: NA átt og lítilsháttar él á mánudag. Hæg breytileg eða suðlæg átt og að mestu þurrt þriðjudag og miðvikudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Unstable windslabs in westerly aspects after rather stiff NE and E wind and snowfall. Snow cover is variable between valleys.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Unstable windslabs gullies and westerly facing slopes after NE and E snow storm this weekend and Monday. Snow cover is variable between places in the forecasting area. Older snow is stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: Minnkandi norðan átt aðfaranótt þriðjudags og dregur úr éljum. Suðlæg átt, bjart yfir og kalt í veðri á þriðjudag, miðvikudag og fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanches released above Neskaupstaður on Jan 20th. On Jan 18th, a few avalanches released in the same areas and in Fannardalur. Avalanches have occurred in Breiðdalur and Hvalnesskriður in the last few days. We sluff occurred in Fannardalur on Jan 12th.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. It has snowed considerably during E-erly winds. A few avalanche have released, three above Neskaupstaður.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed considerably in the Eastfjords and uncertainty phase is ongoing. Evacuations were made in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. Decreasing wind and precipitations on Tuesday. Thick wind slabs are present in the mountains, especially on S-W aspects and in gullies, which could be unstable at first.

travelAdvisory.comment: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Evacuations in Neskaupstaður and Seyðisfjörður. High avalanche danger is expected as the weather is passing, and wind slabs will likely form in gullies and on SW facing slopes. Decreasing precipitation and wind on Tuesday.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Uncertainty phase due to avalanche danger in the Eastfjords. Increased avalanche danger.

weatherForecast.highlights: Dregur úr vindi og úrkomu á þriðjudag og kólnar. Hæglátt veður á miðvikudag en á fimmtudag er útlit fyrir SA-læga átt með dálítilli úrkomu.
